languages.text: Даже из-за многометровой стены реактора до вас доносится дыхание могучего плазмового зверя, что приводит пустотный корабль в движение.
Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.
languages.original_text: Даже из-за многометровой стены реактора до вас доносится дыхание могучего плазмового зверя, что приводит пустотный корабль в движение.

traits.locale_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.
Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.
Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

languages.text: 厚さ数メートルの原子炉の壁の奥からでも、ヴォイドシップの動力となる強大なプラズマの息づかいが聞こえてくるようだ。
languages.original_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

traits.locale_text: 厚さ数メートルの原子炉の壁の奥からでも、ヴォイドシップの動力となる強大なプラズマの息づかいが聞こえてくるようだ。

languages.text: 即便隔着几米厚的反应堆墙，你也能听到那头强大的等离子体野兽的呼吸声，就是它在驱动着这艘虚空舰。
languages.original_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

traits.locale_text: 即便隔着几米厚的反应堆墙，你也能听到那头强大的等离子体野兽的呼吸声，就是它在驱动着这艘虚空舰。

languages.text: Incluso tras los metros de muro del reactor, puedes oír la respiración de la poderosa bestia de plasma que impulsa la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

traits.locale_text: Incluso tras los metros de muro del reactor, puedes oír la respiración de la poderosa bestia de plasma que impulsa la nave del vacío.

languages.text: Même à l'abri derrière le mur épais de plusieurs mètres du réacteur, vous entendez la respiration de la puissante bête à plasma qui propulse le vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

traits.locale_text: Même à l'abri derrière le mur épais de plusieurs mètres du réacteur, vous entendez la respiration de la puissante bête à plasma qui propulse le vaisseau.

languages.text: Selbst hinter der meterdicken Wand der Reaktors hörst den Atem der mächtigen Plasmabestie, die das Raumschiff in Bewegung setzt.
languages.original_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

traits.locale_text: Selbst hinter der meterdicken Wand der Reaktors hörst den Atem der mächtigen Plasmabestie, die das Raumschiff in Bewegung setzt.

languages.text: Reaktörün metrelerce kalınlıktaki duvarlarının arkasından bile uçsuz gemisini hareket ettiren kudretli plazma yaratığının nefesini duyabiliyorsun.
languages.original_text: Even from behind the metres-thick wall of the reactor, you can hear the breath of the mighty plasma beast that sets the voidship in motion.

traits.locale_text: Reaktörün metrelerce kalınlıktaki duvarlarının arkasından bile uçsuz gemisini hareket ettiren kudretli plazma yaratığının nefesini duyabiliyorsun.
